title: WTT: My T205 Austin Sovereign for your Sovereign
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Austin Sovereign for your Sovereign
posts.post_content:
Anybody up for a trade?  Jimmy Austin was the third baseman in that famous picture of Cobb sliding into 3B.  He was also one of the few ball players born in Wales, who then came to the US to play.  And look at him now, slabbed in plastic!  Let me know if you would like to trade for a T205 or T206 Sovereign I need!

Take Care,
Geno
